participant_1.background:

My first activity is checking my grades.
I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves.
I would brag about being a good father and making my family happy.
i am a graduate student studying law.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
I have never been in a relationship because I prefer to spend my time with my cars.
i am an environmental activist.
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
I plan to relax on the weekend and not think too much.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
That is nice! I love to dance, so I often spend rainy days practicing my dance moves in my studio.
That is so cool! I would love to see you dance sometime.
Thanks! What are some of your other interests?
I am an environmental activist and I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
That is awesome! I am a graduate student studying law and I love to spend time with my family.
That is so interesting! I would love to know more about your law studies.
Sure, I would be happy to tell you more about it. What do you want to know?
Anything you would like to share.
Well, I am currently studying international law and I am really interested in human rights law.
That is so interesting! I know a little bit about human rights law.
That is cool! Do you have any experience working in the field?
No, I do not, but I would love to someday.
That is great! I am sure you would be great at it.
You are welcome! I would love to continue this conversation, but I have to go now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
